MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_FLUENCEV5_BROADSIDE
MODULE.description:
Dual-mic Fluence version 5 broadside ECNS#[ #] in the voice processor on the Tx path.
This module supports the following parameter#[ #] IDs
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
VOICE_PARAM_ECHO_PATH_DELAY
VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_EC
VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_NS_SPK
VOICE_PARAM_FP_STAT#[ #]E
VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_NS_SPK_STATE
VOICE_PARAM_MUTE_DET
VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_FLEC
VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_FLEC_STATE
VOICE_PARAM_MUTE_DET_STATE
RTM_LOGG#[ #]ING_PARAM_ENABLE 
RTM_PCM_LOGGING_PARAM

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_ECHO_PATH_DELAY
PARAMETER.description:
Fixed echo path delay in the firmware. The delay is in multiples#[ #] of 8 kHz samples. 
Maximum array size for this parameter 
Version 0 - 4 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_EC
PARAMETER.description:
Fluence version 5 broadside and Fluence Pro version 2 ECNS.
Maximum#[ #] array size for this parameter 
Version 0 716 bytes 
Version 1 extension 724 bytes 
Version 2 extension 732 bytes 
Version 3 extension 740#[ #] bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode#[ #] word for enabling/disabling sub-modules in Fluence V5

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prim_in_chan_L16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Channel Map for#[ #] the primary mic path (hardcoded)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mic_ch_map_L16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Channel Map for Mic 1 path to Fluence V5 (hardcoded)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: input_gain_L16q13
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input Gain for Mic-I input

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_bp_sections
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of BPF#[ #] sections used for filtering the input signals before wind noise detection (WND)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_bp_numq_L16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coeffcient's integer part of Q factor (WND BPF)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_bp_denq_L16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coeffcient's integer part of Q factor (WND BPF)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_calph_L16Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] factor for the cross-covariance estimation in WND

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_cov_bit_shf_L16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] shift (bit-shift) for the cross-covariance estimate in WND

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_ws_alph_inc_L16Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Attack time smoothing factor for the WND score (Higher value means less smoothing)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_ws_alph_dec_L16Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decay time smoothing factor for the WND score (Higher value means less smoothing)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_pri_wind_boost_L16Q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Boost factor for self RMS value of the primary mic wind indicator

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_pri_wind_fact_L16Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Normalization factor for computing the primary mic wind indicator

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_bp_numcoeff_L32
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coeffcient for WND BPF

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_bp_dencoeff_L32
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for WND BPF

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_det_thresh_L32Q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower threshold for Wind noise detection (no wind detected if wind score is below this threshold)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_cov_eps_L32Q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Epsilon#[ #] factor to add to the cross-covariance estimate for stabilizing the value

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnr_dfc_max_L16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Step size#[ #] increment in WNR HPF cut-off frequency

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnr_agg_c_L32
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] cut-off frequency of the HPF used in WNR

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
PARAMETER.description:
Returns the Adaptive Filter (AF) coefficients of the currently#[ #] configured echo canceler. This parameter is read only.

AecPathStruct variable length payload
The total number of taps over all filters for both#[ #] Fg and Bg arrays must not exceed 2000. Fg and Bg filters for a particular filter index i use the same length AFLen[i]. Therefore, the sum of#[ #] AFLen[i] over i from 0 to (NumAfFilter-1) must not exceed (2000 / 2) = 1000. The maximum size is 4024 bytes.
BASE represents the byte offset of the#[ #] current AecPath i, which has filter length AFLen[i]. The next AecPathStruct for index (i+1) starts at offset BASE+4+4*AFLen[i].

Maximum size of#[ #] VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
The memory allocated to get the AF coefficients must be large enough to accommodate the maximum size of the#[ #] VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS structure. The maximum size depends on the maximum number of AF taps allowed for the current topology configuration.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Voice_processing_topology
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Topology ID that defines the mode of echo cancellation.

-#[ #] VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_SM_ECNS_V2 Single-mic ECNS v2
- VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_QM_FLUENCE_PRO Quad-mic Fluence Pro
-#[ #] VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_QM_FLUENCE_PROV2 Quad-mic Fluence Pro v2
- VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_SM_FLUENCEV5 Single-mic Fluence v5
-#[ #] VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_DM_FLUENCEV5 Dual-mic Fluence v5
- VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_DM_FLUENCEV_BROADSIDE
